relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Atlanta 2020
relatedRecords.description: The annual Global Azure (formerly Global Azure Bootcamp) event will return to the greater metro-Atlanta area for the 6th year! The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthus…

relatedRecords.name: TechBash 2020
relatedRecords.description: At TechBash, attendees will take their skills to the next level, learning from experts who share their knowledge in a fun, collaborative, and inclusive environment. TechBash is focused on Web, Cloud, DevOps, Architecture, Best Practices, Soft Skills, and much more. We provide 3 full days of keynotes…

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: Highlights from the Manchester AWS Community Summit held in Manchester 2019. Check our Channel to view the talks in full. Our next event will be held in October in London. If you’re interested in becoming a sponsor please contact joe@comsum.co.uk.
